Judul: CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY (Case Study: Details Company CSR Program)
Abstrak: Economic problems in Indonesia has become a fundamental problem in the development of this country, as we know uneven economic progress in Indonesia to create the same does not mean development that occurred in parts of Indonesia so that there are regions in Indonesia, which experienced a rapid growth and there are many regions in Indonesia that left very far, is due to the uneven economic level in Indonesia as well as different educational levels in each region of Indonesia be a factor causing the uneven development in Indonesia, it is caused by different background in each area of teaching and education infrastructure less well in various regions in Indonesia.Problems inherent in the Desa Cisondari is less well developed economies and less supportive of educational tools that cause less advanced in these villages. the authors focus to discuss problems in the Kutamekar Village and Balong Village, a problem that occurred in this village is underdeveloped economy and education in these two villages, causing the village to be left behind from other villages, we can see from the existing infrastructure in this village like roads or schools that exist in this village, this can not cause the development of these two villages, two villages actually have a natural potential can be developed but their dependence on broker causing these two villages damaged by a broker to buy the estates and their cow's milk cheaply, so they do not get enough profit for them, therefore Details Company and author together to try to find a way out of this problem by doing community service program that is expected to provide a way out for residents of both villages that no longer depend on the middleman and can become an independent village and benefit from this program, Company Details on this program trying to provide solutions to problems, giving them goats ettawa in hopes of goat milk can be use by community to develop the village and their community.
Kata Kunci: Corporate Social Responsibility; Broker; Economy Problem; Education Level
